definition: to be concerned about/to care about
attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
compassion/kindness/care for others/love/CL:片[pian4]/charity (bazaar, golf day etc)/heart (the symbol ♥)
central point/in one's thoughts/in one's heart
to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
to feel relieved/to feel reassured/to be at ease
determination/resolution/determined/firm and resolute/to make up one's mind/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: His heart is beating violently in her breast.
sentences.chinese: 他的心在胸膛里激烈地跳动。

sentences.english: Has the purple devoted to encourage and comfort can only temporarily soothe her injured heart.
sentences.chinese: 曾紫陌的鼓励和安慰也只能暂时稍稍安抚她受伤的心。

sentences.english: My heart is not pain, but pain has long been numb.
sentences.chinese: 我的心一点也不痛，而是早已痛的麻木了。

sentences.english: Don't think of those sad things , take a usual heart and go.
sentences.chinese: 别想那些伤心的事，就带一颗平常的心走。

sentences.english: Winter changes the water of heaven and the heart of man into a stone.
sentences.chinese: 冬季把天上的水和人的心都变成了冰。

sentences.english: The arrow with Hydra’s blood shot through Nemean’s heart.
sentences.chinese: 那浸着许的毒血的箭一下子射进了阿尼破碎的心。

sentences.english: Bloody red noise with the young heart.
sentences.chinese: 如血般的鲜红喧染了年少的心。

sentences.english: Cor ne edito; "Eat not the heart."
My heart sinks and quickly pull to the side.
sentences.chinese: 我的心咯噔一下沉了下去。

sentences.english: The Way of the Dragon God believes that the heart, more than anything else, points the way forward.
sentences.chinese: 龙神道相信指引方向的最大力量莫过于心。

sentences.english: Cupid shot the leaden -pointed arrow straight at Daphne's heart.
sentences.chinese: 邱比特举起那支铅头的箭，对准戴芙妮的心射过去。

sentences.english: Yea, thou castest off fear, and restrainest prayer before God.
sentences.chinese: 你是废弃敬畏的意，在神面前阻止敬虔的心。

sentences.english: Bamboo fence that lines the dying rose, hurt people 's heart.
sentences.chinese: 竹篱笆旁那株即将凋谢的玫瑰，刺痛了路人的心。

sentences.english: Her heart was beating with joy.
Night is so quiet; the only unquiet is my heart missing you.
sentences.chinese: 夜很安静，无法安静的，可能就是我想你的心了。

sentences.english: This is the straight mind, this is our practice in the dojo.
sentences.chinese: 这便是直心，这才是我们修行的道场。

definition: popular feeling/the will of the people
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
Buddha-like heart (full of compassion)/spirit of Buddha (awakened to reality and no longer clinging to appearances)
(Tw) considerate/thoughtful (from Taiwanese 貼心|贴心, Tai-lo pr. [tah-sim])
reluctance to leave this world/heart set on the mundane
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
(one's) original intention, aspiration etc/(Buddhism) "beginner's mind" (i.e. having an attitude of openness when studying a subject just as a beginner in that subject would)
